about_the_game:
If you like this game, please add it to your wishlist~

Summary of the plot：

Your mother is going to travel far, and only left you a letter, and a...beautiful spirit war girl "Shirley".
The letter said:
"Dear son, Shirley is yours, you can do whatever you want!? Looking forward to the day when you can hold your grandson, hehe~ oh! Well...Of course, if you want to call more Spiritual War Ji,
It's okay... By the way, I almost forgot the most important thing! The ambassador of the spirit needs to absorb magic power as the source of life, so it must be exercised! Don't be drains your body! "

Character introduction：

Shirley：

The smile is sweet and cute, with an angelic face, and I like beautiful skirts~

Ruth：

Very good at fighting, two fists are her best weapon~

Jane：

A fighter with super defensive power, usually looks very cold and enthusiastic about getting along with his companions~

Game features:

  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.
  • The monsters who avoid by walking, choose to fight relatively freely.

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some sexual innuendos, depictions of kissing and flirting, and sexy and revealing clothing.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
